display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (All apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal + hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and with >= 4% oxygen desaturation or with arousal) / hour of sleep from type I polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.
calculation: 60 * (hremba4 + hroa4 + hnrba4 + hnroa4 + urbpa4 + uropa4 + unrbpa4 + unropa4 + carbp + carop + canbp + canop + oarbp + oarop + oanbp + oanop  / ttldursp
